survey_name: AI-Powered Career Coaching Platform Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered career coaching platforms to understand user satisfaction, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered career coaching platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify response collection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered career coaching platforms?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most valuable in AI career coaching platforms? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple features. Consider randomizing option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most valuable in AI career coaching platforms? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of career recommendations provided by AI coaching platforms?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Include neutral option to capture ambivalent responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of career recommendations provided by AI coaching platforms?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI career coaching platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters for easier analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: text area with character limit

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI career coaching platforms?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current AI career coaching platform to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score-style question to gauge overall satisfaction. Include clear response options.
